reviewText: If you like Anne of Green Gables, Road to Avonlea, you will like this even more!! This is great, it has many REAL life lessons, it has all ages acting in it, so it will attract all ages too. We care to have clean movies with good lessons so we can all watch as a family. My teen age children did not want to watch it in the beginning, but once they saw the first episode they asked me to get the whole seasons. We are in the fifth season now and it is so nice and heartwarming  when we all gather as a family and watch one episode every night.
Title: Wind at My Back - Season 02

reviewText: I think when I did a review for the first season I had done it prematurely and did not express the totality of my fondness for this program, so I will do that now with the second season. My family and I look forward to our time spent together watching this show that consistantly proves itself to be endearing,entertaining, thought provoaking and wonderful. I appreciate the greatness of this production.
summary: Wind at my Back the 2nd season
Title: Wind at My Back - Season 02

reviewText: I wish the series was still on tv. Unfortunately, it does not look as if it will be coming back.
Title: Wind at My Back - Season 02

reviewText: About half way through watching the first season of Wind At My Back, I was clicking away on the computer to order the second season.  My husband heartily agreed for he said I had him hooked on this series.This series is very entertaining and the characters feel like family in no time at all and you find you would like to live in this small town.  Although the New Bedford setting may seem like a much simpler time than our hectic lives of today, there are still plenty of trials to be overcome and the need to stand up for the right thing when the wrong choice seems so much easier at the time.
summary: HOOKED BY THE FIRST SEASON OF WIND AT MY BACK
Title: Wind at My Back - Season 02

reviewText: We love this series.  It is so well done and pure family entertainment.  We started watching it the minute it arrived.
summary: Wind At My Back the Complete Second Season
Title: Wind at My Back - Season 02

reviewText: I love this story line.  Children weren't desensitized with television and computers.  Childhood obesity was practically nil.  If you were a child of the forties or fifties you had to run and play and imagine.  What better childhood could anyone have had. Growing up with "it's the right thing to do" and a conscience of all things. I would always want to know a person like that.  Anyway, that's my take on it.  I love this series.
summary: Wind At My Back DVD-Wonderful Story Line.
Title: Wind at My Back - Season 02
